directions: Fill a highball glass with ice cubes; pour in tequila, sangrita, citrus soda, lime juice, and fruit seasoning powder. Stir to mix well.
ingredients: 3 ounces sangrita (Mexican-style bloody mary mix with orange and lime)
1 pinch Mexican-style chili powder with lime (such as Tajin® fruit seasoning)
title: Vampiros Mexicanos (Mexican Vampires)
